trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>表示控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source for processing.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>物件，其中包含資料來源進行處理傳遞的引數。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that contains the arguments passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: CreateDataSourceSelectArguments 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件，其中包含引數傳遞至資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object contains the arguments for paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件包含分頁作業的引數。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> ，其中包含傳遞至資料來源的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立資料列，在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CreateRow method is used to create a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: CreateRow 方法用來建立的資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A data-bound <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically generates the rows needed to display the target data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項自動產生顯示目標資料所需的資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to create.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source item to bind to the row.
trans-unit.target: 索引的資料來源繫結至資料列的項目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> created using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>建立使用指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結至資料來源<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBind method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 將資料繫結至資料來源使用資料繫結方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會解析所有資料繫結運算式在使用中的範本中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method is called automatically if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control refers to a valid data source control.
trans-unit.target: 如果自動呼叫 DataBind 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項指的是有效的資料來源控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of manually calling the DataBind method, you can use model binding with your DataBind control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of a method that returns data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 而不是以手動方式呼叫進行資料繫結方法，您可以使用模型繫結與資料繫結控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>屬性名稱的方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>資料</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>設定

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is then automatically populated with the data that is returned from the select method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>接著會自動填入從選取的方法傳回的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Model binding can simplify your code for working with data.
trans-unit.target: 模型繫結可簡化您的程式碼使用的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定陣列，其中包含主索引鍵欄位的顯示中的項目名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyNames property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 請使用 DataKeyNames 屬性指定欄位或欄位代表資料來源的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: You should only set this property to the field or fields that are required to uniquely identify each row; for example, the ID column if an integer value uniquely identifies each row.
trans-unit.target: 您只應設定此屬性來唯一識別每個資料列; 所需的欄位例如，如果整數值的唯一識別碼資料行識別每個資料列。

trans-unit.source: You must set the DataKeyNames property in order for the automatic update and delete features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定的 DataKeyNames 屬性 的自動更新和刪除功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>運作的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to specify the row to update or delete.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要更新或刪除的資料列，這些索引鍵欄位的值會傳遞至資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when updating or deleting a row, use the `Keys` property of either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要擷取的資料更新時，機碼值，或刪除資料列中，使用`Keys`可能是屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, `e.Keys[0]` holds the value of the first data key in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`e.Keys[0]`保存的值中的第一個資料索引鍵<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when a row is selected, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要選取一個資料列時，擷取資料的金鑰值，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the DataKeyNames property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection with the values from the specified field or fields, which provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each row.
trans-unit.target: 當設定的 DataKeyNames 屬性時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項就會自動填入其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>提供便利的方式來存取每個資料列的主索引鍵欄位或指定的欄位的值集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores these key field values in the control state.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項儲存這些索引鍵欄位值中的控制項狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If these values contain sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you enable view-state encryption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些值會包含機密資訊，強烈建議您藉由設定啟用檢視狀態加密<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>屬性`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use automatically generated field columns (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control makes sure that the columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the DataKeyNames property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用自動產生欄位資料行 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性`true`)、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項可確保 DataKeyNames 屬性中指定的欄位對應的資料行是唯讀狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>資料行欄位的屬性設定為`false`，資料行不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項和資料行的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to be available to the client, add the field name to the DataKeyNames property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到可供用戶端的資料行的資料，請將欄位名稱加入至 DataKeyNames 屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含的主索引鍵名稱欄位中顯示的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects that represent the data key value of each row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>代表資料的物件索引鍵中的每個資料列的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控制項中的每個資料列的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object contains the values of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件包含的欄位中指定的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's DataKeys collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件接著會加入至控制項的 DataKeys 集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeys property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataKeys 屬性擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>特定資料列中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for the currently selected row.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>目前選取的資料列的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>直接擷取目前選取的資料列的資料值的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> that contains the data key of each row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"> </xref> ，其中包含每個資料列中的資料金鑰<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要刪除的資料，才能呼叫方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除指定索引處的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the DeleteRow method to programmatically delete the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DeleteRow 方法來以程式設計方式從資料來源中刪除指定索引處的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常使用於您要刪除的記錄從外部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法也會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>控制項未繫結至資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to does not support delete operations, or there is no delete command defined for the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項繫結不支援刪除作業，或不沒有資料來源定義任何 delete 命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要編輯的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index is zero-based (the first row is row zero).
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料列索引 （第一個資料列是資料列零）。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only in the following scenarios, which involve handlers for specific events: - You want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to open in edit mode for a specific row the first time that the page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用只在下列案例中，其中包含特定的事件處理常式:-您想要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項以開啟特定資料列的編輯模式中的頁面會顯示第一次。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can set the EditIndex property in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class or of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以設定 EditIndex 屬性中的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: - You want to know which row was edited after the row was updated.
trans-unit.target: -您想要知道哪一個資料列已在編輯過之後已更新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can retrieve the row index from the EditIndex property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以從 EditIndex 屬性中擷取的資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: - You are binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: -您要繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項至資料來源，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case you must set the EditIndex property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下您必須設定 EditIndex 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: If you set the EditIndex property after a postback or in handlers for events that are raised later than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control might not enter edit mode for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 如果在回傳後或引發的事件處理常式中，將 EditIndex 屬性晚於<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項可能會不進入編輯模式，針對指定的資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: If you read the value of this property in other event handlers, the index is not guaranteed to reflect the row that is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果您讀取其他事件處理常式中的此屬性的值，索引不會保證以反映正在編輯的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To determine which row the user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink in before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪個資料列的使用者已按一下**編輯**按鈕或中的超連結，然後再<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項進入編輯模式，您可以擷取從資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from entering edit mode after a user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項進入編輯模式之後使用者已按一下,**編輯**按鈕或超連結，將<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>物件`true`中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 若要編輯的資料列的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示正在編輯沒有資料列。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引為小於-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the row selected for editing in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定中進行編輯選取的資料列的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EditRowStyle 屬性來控制資料列中編輯的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<EditRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the row being edited in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，代表正在編輯中的資料列樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定空白資料列的外觀呈現時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the null row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EmptyDataRowStyle 屬性來控制中的 null 資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The null row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄時，會顯示 null 的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<EmptyDataRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that enables you to set the appearance of the null row.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，可讓您設定為 null 的資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者定義的內容，來轉譯時的空白資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性來定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定空白資料列的自訂範本，先將`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，設定為空的資料列使用內建的 UI<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically access controls that you declare in an empty data template, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何以程式設計方式存取您宣告空的資料範本中的控制項的資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 存取伺服器控制項的 ID](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>和 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性會設定、 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含空白資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定来顯示空的資料列中的文字呈現時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EmptyDataText 屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 EmptyDataText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空白資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否驗證程式控制項將會處理發生在進行插入或更新作業的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證程式控制項將會處理或更新作業; 在插入期間發生的例外狀況，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出選取的資料列根據索引或資料索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false` and a row is selected, the same row is selected when a new page is displayed even though the new page has different data in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`並選取資料列，即使新的頁面中有不同的資料，會顯示新的頁面時，系統會選取相同的資料列。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, when you display a page that has different data in it, no row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，當您顯示一個頁面中，有不同的資料，會選取任何資料列。

trans-unit.source: If you then return to the page on which a row was selected, that row is still selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您再傳回至頁面選取一個資料列，該資料列已選取。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列選取範圍根據資料索引鍵的值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callbacks are used for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出用戶端回呼用於排序和分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a sorting or paging operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control posts back to the server to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，排序或分頁作業執行時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項回傳至伺服器執行的作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks property is set to `true`, a service is called on the client to perform sorting and paging operations, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當 EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks 屬性設定為`true`、 服務稱為 「 用戶端執行的排序和分頁作業，就不需要文章回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 並非所有瀏覽器都支援這項功能。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a browser supports this feature, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷瀏覽器是否支援這項功能，請使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: All columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection must support callbacks for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合必須支援這項功能運作的回呼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合包含的資料行，不支援回呼，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>、<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引發例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用用戶端回呼來排序和分頁作業。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*>集合包含的資料行，不支援回呼，例如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the specified row and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的資料列內宣告的每個欄位的值，並將它們儲存在指定<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: ExtractRowValues 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>要擷取的值，宣告所指定之資料列中每個欄位的控制項`row`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定擷取的值使用是否包含唯讀欄位和索引鍵欄位`includeReadOnlyFields`和`includePrimaryKey`參數，分別。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref>用來儲存欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> from which to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>要從中擷取的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括唯讀欄位。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包含主索引鍵欄位或欄位。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>物件，代表頁尾資料列中的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterRow 屬性，若要以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件，代表頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FooterRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > FooterRow 屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項建立頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 後必須執行 FooterRow 屬性所做的任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>頁尾資料列中的表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterStyle 屬性來控制頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<FooterStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示頁尾資料列中的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回回呼事件以控制項為目標的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>介面並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以非同步方式擷取資料和 GetCallbackResult 方法所擷取的資料傳回至控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的結果。

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 建立回呼指令碼會執行排序作業的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The GetCallbackScript method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: GetCallbackScript 方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立執行排序作業的按鈕的回呼指令碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕控制項，以便用來建立回呼指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至回呼指令碼的引數。

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 回呼指令碼會執行排序作業的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定格線樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用格線屬性來指定格線樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|No gridlines are displayed.| |`GridLines.Horizontal`|Displays the horizontal gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Vertical`|Displays the vertical gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Both`|Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.|
trans-unit.target: |樣式 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|不顯示格線。 | |`GridLines.Horizontal`|顯示水平格線。 | |`GridLines.Vertical`|顯示垂直格線。 | |`GridLines.Both`|顯示水平和垂直格線。 |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定水平對齊<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的水平對齊 HorizontalAlign 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>頁面內控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的水平對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: |Alignment value|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.|
trans-unit.target: |對齊值 |描述 | |---------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|尚未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項的水平對齊。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項是在頁面上靠左對齊。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項置於頁面。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項是在頁面上靠右對齊。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項對齊頁面的左、 右邊界。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: The InitializePager method is used to initialize the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: InitializePager 方法用來初始化啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the pager row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>表示頁面巡覽列，來初始化。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns the pager row should span.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列應該跨越的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> ，代表資料來源。

trans-unit.target: 初始化中的資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.target: InitializeRow 方法用來初始化中的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>表示中的資料行欄位的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的資料類型是否可以繫結中的資料行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The IsBindableType method is a helper method that is commonly used by control developers to programmatically determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: IsBindableType 方法是 helper 方法，通常由控制項開發人員用來以程式設計方式判斷指定的資料類型是否可以繫結中的資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following data types can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control: - <xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Guid?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: The following data types can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control: - <xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Guid?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Guid?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName>表示要測試的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的資料類型可以繫結中的資料行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 載入中的屬性狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項需要保存，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來載入中的屬性狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項需要保存，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>包含控制項的已儲存的控制項狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的檢視狀態的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>包含控制項的已儲存的檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要在頁面的使用者介面 (UI) 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞 Web 伺服器控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnBubbleEvent method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: OnBubbleEvent 方法會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，將事件從子控制項傳遞至頁面階層。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已取消。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 重新繫結<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>後其資料的控制項<> *>， <> </> *>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind the control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: OnDataPropertyChanged 方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>後其資料的控制項重新繫結控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method notifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法會通知<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>基礎資料來源已變更，而且控制項應重新繫結的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the OnDataSourceViewChanged method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，當資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時，會呼叫 OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's View state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子系或父這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時，但之後，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as a custom paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如自訂分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnPageIndexChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPageIndexChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時前,，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPageIndexChanging method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPageIndexChanging 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: There is no handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 沒有處理常式，如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>按一下資料列處於編輯模式下的 [取消] 按鈕時，會引發事件，但該資料列結束之前編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如停止取消作業，會讓資料列處於不良狀態，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>中按下按鈕時，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnRowCommand method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnRowCommand 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>就會引發事件時每個資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>建立控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個資料列必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>資料資料列時，就會引發事件 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件) 中的資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如修改繫結的資料列，此事件發生時的值。
